item.title: Report X-2024110520
item.description:
Report X-2024110520

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-15T12:23:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-04
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: 1. X-2024110520 SUPERVISOR CALLED IN A LEAKER TO THE DMP AND DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND THE LEAKING PACKAGE. RESPONDER FOLLOWED THE DECSION TREE GUIDLINES AND WENT TO RESPONSE SHEET SEVEN. RESPONDER FOLLOWED CLEAN UP PROCEDURE AND BROUGHT THE LEAKER BACK TO THE DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL. PACKAGE WAS PROPERLY DISPOSED OF. 2. X-2024110521 LEAKER WAS CALLED INTO THE DMP AND DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART TO DOOR 22. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND THE LEAKER AND USED THE DECSION TREE TO FIND CORRECT RESPONSE SHEET. RESPONDER USED THE FLAMMABLE LIQUID RESPONSE SHEET TO CLEAN UP THE SPILL AND BRING BACK THE LEAKER TO DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL. LEAKER WAS PROPERLY DISPOSED OF.

item.title: Report X-2024110443
item.description:
Report X-2024110443

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-14T12:23:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-31
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SUPERVISOR CALLED IN A LEAKER TO THE DMP AND DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND THE LEAKER. RESPONDER USED THE DECSION TREE TO FIND THE RIGHT RESPONSE SHEET. RESPONDER USED RESPONSE SHEET ON PAGE 11 FOR NON-FLAMMABLE GAS. RESPONDER FOLLOWED CLEAN UP PROCEDURE OUTLINED IN RESPONSE PAGE. RESPONDER BROUGHT THE LEAKER BACK TO THE DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL OF LEAKER. LEAKER WAS PROPERLY DISPOSED OF.
